messages.title: Stop the Threat of another Independence Referendum
messages.content: Nicola Sturgeon wants to hold another independence referendum next year, and Labour will not stand in the way of this. This election could be our last chance to stop that referendum.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour and the Lib Dems are too weak to beat the SNP here. Only a vote for Julie Pirone and the Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party can stop them.

issues.governance: CORBYN ACCUSED OF PLOT TO BREAK UP BRITAIN

quotes.text: CORBYN ACCUSED OF PLOT TO BREAK UP BRITAIN
Corbyn could back new indyref 'as early as 2021'

images.caption: Julie Pirone, Your Scottish Conservative and Unionist Candidate for Paisley and Renfrewshire North
